question: Which of the following statements is true?

answers.a: The __init__() method is defined in the object class.
answers.b: The __new__() method is defined in the object class.
answers.c: By default, the __new__() method invokes the __init__ method.

question: Which of the following statements is true?

answers.a: The __new__() method automatically invokes the __init__ method
answers.b: The __init__ method is defined in the object class
answers.c: The __eq(other) method is defined in the object class
answers.d: The __repr__() method is defined in the object class
